verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of man שְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> there were two נָשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> women בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> the daughters אֵם־ <S%H517><s%> mother אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> of one הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וַתִּזְנֶ֣ינָה <S%H2181><s%> And they committed whoredoms בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt בִּנְעוּרֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H5271><s%> in their youth זָנ֑וּ <S%H2181><s%> they committed whoredoms שָׁ֚מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there מֹעֲכ֣וּ <S%H4600><s%> pressed שְׁדֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H7699><s%> there were their breasts וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> and there עִשּׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and there they bruised דַּדֵּ֖י <S%H1717><s%> the teats בְּתוּלֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H1331><s%> of their virginity

וּשְׁמוֹתָ֗ן <S%H8034><s%> And the names אָהֳלָ֤ה <S%H170><s%> of them [were] Aholah הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> the elder וְאָהֳלִיבָ֣ה <S%H172><s%> and Aholibah אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H269><s%> her sister וַתִּֽהְיֶ֣ינָה <S%H1961><s%> became לִ֔י וַתֵּלַ֖דְנָה <S%H3205><s%> and they were mine and they bare בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> and daughters וּשְׁמוֹתָ֕ן <S%H8034><s%> Thus [were] their names שֹׁמְר֣וֹן <S%H8111><s%> Samaria אָהֳלָ֔ה <S%H170><s%> [is] Aholah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem אָהֳלִיבָֽה׃ <S%H172><s%> Aholibah

וַתִּ֥זֶן <S%H2181><s%> played the harlot אָהֳלָ֖ה <S%H170><s%> And Aholah תַּחְתָּ֑י <S%H8478><s%> when she was mine וַתַּעְגַּב֙ <S%H5689><s%> and she doted עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> after מְאַהֲבֶ֔יהָ <S%H157><s%> on her lovers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> after אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> on the Assyrians קְרוֹבִֽים׃ <S%H7138><s%> [her] neighbours

לְבֻשֵׁ֤י <S%H3847><s%> [Which were] clothed תְכֵ֙לֶת֙ <S%H8504><s%> with blue פַּח֣וֹת <S%H6346><s%> captains וּסְגָנִ֔ים <S%H5461><s%> and rulers בַּח֥וּרֵי <S%H970><s%> young men חֶ֖מֶד <S%H2531><s%> all of them desirable כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> all פָּרָשִׁ֕ים <S%H6571><s%> horsemen רֹכְבֵ֖י <S%H7392><s%> riding סוּסִֽים׃ <S%H5483><s%> upon horses

וַתִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> Thus she committed תַּזְנוּתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H8457><s%> her whoredoms עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> them מִבְחַ֥ר <S%H4005><s%> with them with all them [that were] the chosen בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> men אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> all וּבְכֹ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom עָֽגְבָ֛ה <S%H5689><s%> and with all on whom she doted בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גִּלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> with all their idols נִטְמָֽאָה׃ <S%H2930><s%> she defiled

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּזְנוּתֶ֤יהָ <S%H8457><s%> she her whoredoms מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> [brought] from Egypt לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָזָ֔בָה <S%H5800><s%> Neither left כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H854><s%> for שָׁכְב֣וּ <S%H7901><s%> they lay בִנְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5271><s%> for in her youth וְהֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like עִשּׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> with her and they bruised דַּדֵּ֣י <S%H1717><s%> the breasts בְתוּלֶ֑יהָ <S%H1331><s%> of her virginity וַיִּשְׁפְּכ֥וּ <S%H8210><s%> and poured תַזְנוּתָ֖ם <S%H8457><s%> their whoredom עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

לָכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore נְתַתִּ֖יהָ <S%H5414><s%> Wherefore I have delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> her into the hand מְאַֽהֲבֶ֑יהָ <S%H157><s%> of her lovers בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> Asshur אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom עָגְבָ֖ה <S%H5689><s%> upon whom she doted עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> after

הֵמָּה֮ <S%H1992><s%> They גִּלּ֣וּ <S%H1540><s%> These discovered עֶרְוָתָהּ֒ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness בָּנֶ֤יהָ <S%H1121><s%> her sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> and her daughters לָקָ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> they took וְאוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> her with the sword הָרָ֑גוּ <S%H2026><s%> and slew וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became שֵׁם֙ <S%H8034><s%> and she became famous לַנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> among women וּשְׁפוּטִ֖ים <S%H8196><s%> judgment עָ֥שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> for they had executed בָֽהּ׃ ס

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw אֲחוֹתָ֣הּ <S%H269><s%> And when her sister אָהֳלִיבָ֔ה <S%H172><s%> Aholibah וַתַּשְׁחֵ֥ת <S%H7843><s%> [this] she was more corrupt עַגְבָתָ֖הּ <S%H5691><s%> in her inordinate love מִמֶּ֑נָּה <S%H4480><s%> was more וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּ֨זְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <S%H8457><s%> than she and in her whoredoms מִזְּנוּנֵ֖י <S%H2183><s%> in [her] whoredoms אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H269><s%> more than her sister

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> after בְּנֵי֩ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אַשּׁ֨וּר <S%H804><s%> Asshur עָגָ֜בָה <S%H5689><s%> She doted פַּח֨וֹת <S%H6346><s%> captains וּסְגָנִ֤ים <S%H5461><s%> and rulers קְרֹבִים֙ <S%H7138><s%> [her] neighbours לְבֻשֵׁ֣י <S%H3847><s%> clothed מִכְל֔וֹל <S%H4358><s%> most gorgeously פָּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> horsemen רֹכְבֵ֣י <S%H7392><s%> riding סוּסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> upon horses בַּח֥וּרֵי <S%H970><s%> young men חֶ֖מֶד <S%H2531><s%> all of them desirable כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

וָאֵ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> Then I saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נִטְמָ֑אָה <S%H2930><s%> that she was defiled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one לִשְׁתֵּיהֶֽן׃ <S%H8147><s%> [that] they [took] both

וַתּ֖וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> And [that] she increased אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תַּזְנוּתֶ֑יהָ <S%H8457><s%> her whoredoms וַתֵּ֗רֶא <S%H7200><s%> for when she saw אַנְשֵׁי֙ <S%H376><s%> men מְחֻקֶּ֣ה <S%H2707><s%> pourtrayed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> upon the wall צַלְמֵ֣י <S%H6754><s%> the images [כַשְׂדִּיִּים כ] (כַשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> Chaldeans ק) חֲקֻקִ֖ים <S%H2710><s%> pourtrayed בַּשָּׁשַֽׁר׃ <S%H8350><s%> with vermilion

חֲגוֹרֵ֨י <S%H2289><s%> Girded אֵז֜וֹר <S%H232><s%> with girdles בְּמָתְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4975><s%> upon their loins סְרוּחֵ֤י <S%H5628><s%> exceeding טְבוּלִים֙ <S%H2871><s%> in dyed attire בְּרָ֣אשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads מַרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> to look to שָׁלִשִׁ֖ים <S%H7991><s%> all of them princes כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> all דְּמ֤וּת <S%H1823><s%> after the manner בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> Babel כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> of Chaldea אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מוֹלַדְתָּֽם׃ <S%H4138><s%> of their nativity

[וַתַּעְגַּב כ] (וַתַּעְגְּבָ֥ה <S%H5689><s%> dote ק) עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> after לְמַרְאֵ֣ה <S%H4758><s%> And as soon as she saw עֵינֶ֑יהָ <S%H5869><s%> them with her eyes וַתִּשְׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> upon them and sent מַלְאָכִ֛ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to כַּשְׂדִּֽימָה׃ <S%H3778><s%> unto them into Chaldea

וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> came אֵלֶ֤יהָ <S%H413><s%> about בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> Babel לְמִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H4904><s%> to her into the bed דֹּדִ֔ים <S%H1730><s%> of love וַיְטַמְּא֥וּ <S%H2930><s%> and they defiled אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> בְּתַזְנוּתָ֑ם <S%H8457><s%> her with their whoredom וַתִּ֨טְמָא־ <S%H2930><s%> and she was polluted בָ֔ם וַתֵּ֥קַע <S%H3363><s%> was alienated נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> with them and her mind מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וַתְּגַל֙ <S%H1540><s%> So she discovered תַּזְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <S%H8457><s%> her whoredoms וַתְּגַ֖ל <S%H1540><s%> and discovered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶרְוָתָ֑הּ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness וַתֵּ֤קַע <S%H3363><s%> was alienated נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> then my mind מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after נָקְעָ֥ה <S%H5361><s%> was alienated נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> from her like as my mind מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> with אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H269><s%> from her sister

וַתַּרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> Yet she multiplied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּזְנוּתֶ֑יהָ <S%H8457><s%> her whoredoms לִזְכֹּר֙ <S%H2142><s%> in calling to remembrance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days נְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5271><s%> of her youth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> when זָנְתָ֖ה <S%H2181><s%> wherein she had played the harlot בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַֽתַּעְגְּבָ֔ה <S%H5689><s%> For she doted עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> after פִּֽלַגְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <S%H6370><s%> upon their paramours אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whose בְּשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> whose flesh חֲמוֹרִים֙ <S%H2543><s%> of asses בְּשָׂרָ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> [is as] the flesh וְזִרְמַ֥ת <S%H2231><s%> and whose issue סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> of horses זִרְמָתָֽם׃ <S%H2231><s%> [is like] the issue

וַֽתִּפְקְדִ֔י <S%H6485><s%> Thus thou calledst to remembrance אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> זִמַּ֣ת <S%H2154><s%> the lewdness נְעוּרָ֑יִךְ <S%H5271><s%> of thy youth בַּעְשׂ֤וֹת <S%H6213><s%> in bruising מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> by the Egyptians דַּדַּ֔יִךְ <S%H1717><s%> thy teats לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> because שְׁדֵ֥י <S%H7699><s%> for the paps נְעוּרָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5271><s%> of thy youth ס

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אָהֳלִיבָ֗ה <S%H172><s%> Therefore O Aholibah כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵעִ֤יר <S%H5782><s%> Behold I will raise up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְאַהֲבַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H157><s%> thy lovers עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom נָקְעָ֥ה <S%H5361><s%> is alienated נַפְשֵׁ֖ךְ <S%H5315><s%> against thee from whom thy mind מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> and I וַהֲבֵאתִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> and I will bring עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> them against thee on every side

בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָבֶ֣ל <S%H894><s%> Babel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כַּשְׂדִּ֗ים <S%H3778><s%> and all the Chaldeans פְּק֤וֹד <S%H6489><s%> Pekod וְשׁ֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H7772><s%> and Shoa וְק֔וֹעַ <S%H6970><s%> and Koa כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> Asshur אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for בַּח֨וּרֵי <S%H970><s%> young men חֶ֜מֶד <S%H2531><s%> with them all of them desirable פַּח֤וֹת <S%H6346><s%> captains וּסְגָנִים֙ <S%H5461><s%> and rulers כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all שָֽׁלִשִׁים֙ <S%H7991><s%> great lords וּקְרוּאִ֔ים <S%H7121><s%> and renowned רֹכְבֵ֥י <S%H7392><s%> all of them riding סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> upon horses כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

וּבָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they shall come עָלַ֡יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against הֹ֠צֶן <S%H2021><s%> against thee with chariots רֶ֤כֶב <S%H7393><s%> wagons וְגַלְגַּל֙ <S%H1534><s%> and wheels וּבִקְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> and with an assembly עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> of people צִנָּ֤ה <S%H6793><s%> against thee buckler וּמָגֵן֙ <S%H4043><s%> and shield וְקוֹבַ֔ע <S%H6959><s%> and helmet יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> [which] shall set עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> and I will set לִפְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> before מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּשְׁפָט֖וּךְ <S%H8199><s%> them and they shall judge בְּמִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4941><s%> thee according to their judgments

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> And I will set קִנְאָתִ֜י <S%H7068><s%> my jealousy בָּ֗ךְ וְעָשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> against thee and they shall deal אוֹתָךְ֙ <S%H854><s%> in בְּחֵמָ֔ה <S%H2534><s%> furiously אַפֵּ֤ךְ <S%H639><s%> thy nose וְאָזְנַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H241><s%> and thine ears יָסִ֔ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> with thee they shall take away וְאַחֲרִיתֵ֖ךְ <S%H319><s%> and thy remnant בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword תִּפּ֑וֹל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like בָּנַ֤יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> thy sons וּבְנוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters יִקָּ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> they shall take וְאַחֲרִיתֵ֖ךְ <S%H319><s%> and thy residue תֵּאָכֵ֥ל <S%H398><s%> shall be devoured בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> by the fire

וְהִפְשִׁיט֖וּךְ <S%H6584><s%> They shall also strip אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֑יִךְ <S%H899><s%> thee out of thy clothes וְלָקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> and take away כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> jewels תִפְאַרְתֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H8597><s%> thy fair

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֤י <S%H7673><s%> to cease זִמָּתֵךְ֙ <S%H2154><s%> Thus will I make thy lewdness מִמֵּ֔ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְנוּתֵ֖ךְ <S%H2184><s%> from thee and thy whoredom מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [brought] from the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשְׂאִ֤י <S%H5375><s%> so that thou shalt not lift up עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or תִזְכְּרִי־ <S%H2142><s%> unto them nor remember עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹֽתְנָ֔ךְ <S%H5414><s%> Behold I will deliver בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> thee into the hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom שָׂנֵ֑את <S%H8130><s%> [of them] whom thou hatest בְּיַ֛ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom נָקְעָ֥ה <S%H5361><s%> is alienated נַפְשֵׁ֖ךְ <S%H5315><s%> [of them] from whom thy mind מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> They

וְעָשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> And they shall deal אוֹתָ֜ךְ <S%H854><s%> in בְּשִׂנְאָ֗ה <S%H8135><s%> with thee hatefully וְלָקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> and shall take away כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְגִיעֵ֔ךְ <S%H3018><s%> all thy labour וַעֲזָב֖וּךְ <S%H5800><s%> and shall leave עֵירֹ֣ם <S%H5903><s%> thee naked וְעֶרְיָ֑ה <S%H6181><s%> and bare וְנִגְלָה֙ <S%H1540><s%> shall be discovered עֶרְוַ֣ת <S%H6172><s%> and the nakedness זְנוּנַ֔יִךְ <S%H2183><s%> of thy whoredoms וְזִמָּתֵ֖ךְ <S%H2154><s%> both thy lewdness וְתַזְנוּתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8457><s%> and thy whoredoms

עָשֹׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> I will do אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These לָ֑ךְ בִּזְנוֹתֵךְ֙ <S%H2181><s%> these [things] unto thee because thou hast gone a whoring אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you נִטְמֵ֖את <S%H2930><s%> [and] because thou art polluted בְּגִלּוּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1544><s%> with their idols

בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way אֲחוֹתֵ֖ךְ <S%H269><s%> of thy sister הָלָ֑כְתְּ <S%H1980><s%> Thou hast walked וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> therefore will I give כוֹסָ֖הּ <S%H3563><s%> her cup בְּיָדֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3027><s%> into thine hand ס

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD כּ֤וֹס <S%H3563><s%> cup אֲחוֹתֵךְ֙ <S%H269><s%> of thy sister's תִּשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H8354><s%> Thou shalt drink הָעֲמֻקָּ֖ה <S%H6013><s%> deep וְהָרְחָבָ֑ה <S%H7342><s%> and large תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִצְחֹ֛ק <S%H6712><s%> thou shalt be laughed to scorn וּלְלַ֖עַג <S%H3932><s%> mock מִרְבָּ֥ה <S%H4767><s%> much לְהָכִֽיל׃ <S%H3557><s%> it containeth

שִׁכָּר֥וֹן <S%H7943><s%> with drunkenness וְיָג֖וֹן <S%H3015><s%> and sorrow תִּמָּלֵ֑אִי <S%H4390><s%> Thou shalt be filled כּ֚וֹס <S%H3563><s%> with the cup שַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> of astonishment וּשְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> and desolation כּ֖וֹס <S%H3563><s%> with the cup אֲחוֹתֵ֥ךְ <S%H269><s%> of thy sister שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> Samaria

וְשָׁתִ֨ית <S%H8354><s%> Thou shalt even drink אוֹתָ֜הּ <S%H853><s%> וּמָצִ֗ית <S%H4680><s%> it and suck [it] out וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲרָשֶׂ֛יהָ <S%H2789><s%> the sherds תְּגָרֵ֖מִי <S%H1633><s%> and thou shalt break וְשָׁדַ֣יִךְ <S%H7699><s%> thine own breasts תְּנַתֵּ֑קִי <S%H5423><s%> thereof and pluck off כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because שָׁכַ֣חַתְּ <S%H7911><s%> Because thou hast forgotten אוֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> וַתַּשְׁלִ֥יכִי <S%H7993><s%> me and cast אוֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> me behind גַוֵּ֑ךְ <S%H1458><s%> thy back וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> now אַ֛תְּ <S%H859><s%> you שְׂאִ֥י <S%H5375><s%> therefore bear זִמָּתֵ֖ךְ <S%H2154><s%> thou also thy lewdness וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּזְנוּתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8457><s%> and thy whoredoms ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> moreover unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הֲתִשְׁפּ֥וֹט <S%H8199><s%> wilt thou judge אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אָהֳלָ֖ה <S%H170><s%> Aholah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָהֳלִיבָ֑ה <S%H172><s%> Oholibah וְהַגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> bewray לָהֶ֔ן אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> תוֹעֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H8441><s%> unto them their abominations

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נִאֵ֗פוּ <S%H5003><s%> That they have committed adultery וְדָם֙ <S%H1818><s%> and blood בִּֽידֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H3027><s%> [is] in their hands וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H1544><s%> and with their idols נִאֵ֑פוּ <S%H5003><s%> have they committed adultery וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> and even אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶן֙ <S%H1121><s%> and have also caused their sons אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָֽלְדוּ־ <S%H3205><s%> whom they bare לִ֔י הֶעֱבִ֥ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> unto me to pass for them through לָהֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> [the fire] to devour

ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Again זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> they עָ֣שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> Moreover this they have done לִ֑י טִמְּא֤וּ <S%H2930><s%> unto me they have defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <S%H4720><s%> my sanctuary בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the same day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths חִלֵּֽלוּ׃ <S%H2490><s%> and have profaned

וּֽבְשַׁחֲטָ֤ם <S%H7819><s%> For when they had slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> their children לְגִלּ֣וּלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1544><s%> to their idols וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> then they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִקְדָּשִׁ֛י <S%H4720><s%> into my sanctuary בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same לְחַלְּל֑וֹ <S%H2490><s%> to profane וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and lo כֹ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> it and lo thus have they done בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst בֵּיתִֽי׃ <S%H1004><s%> of mine house

וְאַ֗ף <S%H637><s%> And furthermore כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> have even תִשְׁלַ֙חְנָה֙ <S%H7971><s%> that ye have sent לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> men בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> to come מִמֶּרְחָ֑ק <S%H4801><s%> from far אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom מַלְאָ֜ךְ <S%H4397><s%> unto whom a messenger שָׁל֤וּחַ <S%H7971><s%> [was] sent אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> and וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> lo בָ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> and lo they came לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> to whom רָחַ֛צְתְּ <S%H7364><s%> for whom thou didst wash כָּחַ֥לְתְּ <S%H3583><s%> thyself paintedst עֵינַ֖יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> thy eyes וְעָ֥דִית <S%H5710><s%> and deckedst עֶֽדִי׃ <S%H5716><s%> thyself with ornaments

וְיָשַׁבְתְּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> And satest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִטָּ֣ה <S%H4296><s%> bed כְבוּדָּ֔ה <S%H3520><s%> upon a stately וְשֻׁלְחָ֥ן <S%H7979><s%> and a table עָר֖וּךְ <S%H6186><s%> prepared לְפָנֶ֑יהָ <S%H6440><s%> before וּקְטָרְתִּ֥י <S%H7004><s%> mine incense וְשַׁמְנִ֖י <S%H8081><s%> and mine oil שַׂ֥מְתְּ <S%H7760><s%> it whereupon thou hast set עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> And a voice הָמוֹן֮ <S%H1995><s%> of a multitude שָׁלֵ֣ו <S%H7961><s%> being at ease בָהּ֒ וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with אֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> men מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> abundance אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> man מוּבָאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> [were] brought [סֹובָאִים כ] (סָבָאִ֖ים <S%H5433><s%> drunkard ק) מִמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> from the wilderness וַֽיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> which put צְמִידִים֙ <S%H6781><s%> bracelets אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on יְדֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H3027><s%> upon their hands וַעֲטֶ֥רֶת <S%H5850><s%> crowns תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and beautiful עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רָאשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> Then said לַבָּלָ֖ה <S%H1087><s%> I unto [her that was] old נִֽאוּפִ֑ים <S%H5004><s%> in adulteries [עַתָּ כ] (עַתָּ֛ה ק) [יִזְנֻה כ] (יִזְנ֥וּ <S%H2181><s%> commit fornication ק) תַזְנוּתֶ֖הָ <S%H8457><s%> whoredoms וָהִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> they

וַיָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> Yet they went in אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> to כְּב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> unto her as they go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> unto a woman זוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2181><s%> that playeth the harlot כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus בָּ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> so went they in אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָֽהֳלָה֙ <S%H170><s%> unto Aholah וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אָ֣הֳלִיבָ֔ה <S%H172><s%> and unto Aholibah אִשֹּׁ֖ת <S%H802><s%> women הַזִּמָּֽה׃ <S%H2154><s%> the lewd

וַאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> men צַדִּיקִ֗ם <S%H6662><s%> And the righteous הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like יִשְׁפְּט֣וּ <S%H8199><s%> they shall judge אֽוֹתְהֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפַּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> them after the manner נֹֽאֲפ֔וֹת <S%H5003><s%> of adulteresses וּמִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> and after the manner שֹׁפְכ֣וֹת <S%H8210><s%> of women that shed דָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> blood כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because נֹֽאֲפֹת֙ <S%H5003><s%> because they [are] adulteresses הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in וְדָ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> and blood בִּֽידֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H3027><s%> [is] in their hands ס

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הַעֲלֵ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> I will bring up עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> against קָהָ֔ל <S%H6951><s%> a company וְנָתֹ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> upon them and will give אֶתְהֶ֖ן <S%H853><s%> לְזַעֲוָ֥ה <S%H2189><s%> them to be removed וְלָבַֽז׃ <S%H957><s%> and spoiled

וְרָגְמ֨וּ <S%H7275><s%> shall stone עֲלֵיהֶ֥ן <S%H5921><s%> with אֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> them with stones קָהָ֔ל <S%H6951><s%> And the company וּבָרֵ֥א <S%H1254><s%> and dispatch אוֹתְהֶ֖ן <S%H853><s%> בְּחַרְבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H2719><s%> them with their swords בְּנֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H1121><s%> their sons וּבְנֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters יַהֲרֹ֔גוּ <S%H2026><s%> they shall slay וּבָתֵּיהֶ֖ן <S%H1004><s%> their houses בָּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire יִשְׂרֹֽפוּ׃ <S%H8313><s%> and burn up

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֥י <S%H7673><s%> to cease זִמָּ֖ה <S%H2154><s%> Thus will I cause lewdness מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land וְנִֽוַּסְּרוּ֙ <S%H3256><s%> may be taught כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> that all women וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not תַעֲשֶׂ֖ינָה <S%H6213><s%> not to do כְּזִמַּתְכֶֽנָה׃ <S%H2154><s%> after your lewdness

וְנָתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they shall recompense זִמַּתְכֶ֙נָה֙ <S%H2154><s%> your lewdness עֲלֵיכֶ֔ן <S%H5921><s%> and וַחֲטָאֵ֥י <S%H2399><s%> the sins גִלּוּלֵיכֶ֖ן <S%H1544><s%> of your idols תִּשֶּׂ֑אינָה <S%H5375><s%> upon you and ye shall bear וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ
